import React, { Component } from "react"; class CustomerDashboardMainContent extends Component { state = {}; calculateOnGoingTenders = () => { const { tenders } = this.props.user.details; const temp = tenders.filter( (tender) => tender.status === "inProcess" || tender.status === "awarded" ); return temp.length; }; calculateCompletedTenders = () => { const { tenders } = this.props.user.details; const temp = tenders.filter((tender) => tender.status === "paid"); return temp.length; }; render() { const { user } = this.props; return (

); } } export default CustomerDashboardMainContent;
